third_party_warning: This is a third-party application, not associated with the official devRant application.
app_short_desc: The hackable, plugin-able, Qt-based, Python-powered devRant client
app_arg_nogui_help: Start in CLI mode. qtpy-rant becomes just py-rant
app_arg_theme_tool_help: Open the theme tool for creating and editing themes
cli_no_users_logged_in: No users logged in. Log in now?
cli_hint_exit: Welcome to CLI mode. Type "exit" to exit
cli_rant_command_help_lines: Execute with no arguments to get a rant
This has the same effect as executing "rant next"
